module.label: IsoSeq Reads Of Insert
module.description: Generates consensus sequences from single molecules for IsoSeq.

param.name: minFullPasses
param.label: Minimum Full Passes
param.title: The minimum number of full-length passes over the insert DNA for the read to be emitted.

rule.message: Value must be an integer between 0 and 10

module.label: IsoSeq Classify v1
module.description: A cDNA analysis workflow to extract reads of insert from PacBio movies, classify them into chimeric or non-chimeric, full-length or non-full-length reads, and map them to the user-specific reference sequence using GMAP.

param.name: minSeqLen
param.label: Minimum sequence length
param.title: The minimum sequence length of each read to analyze.

rule.message: Value must be a non-negative integer

param.name: minScore
param.label: Maximum phmmer score for primer hit
param.title: The minimum phmmer score to detect a primer in a read.

rule.message: Value must be a non-negative integer

param.name: customizedPrimerFa
param.label: Customized primers in FASTA (optional)
param.title: Use customized primers (in a FASTA file) instead of using the default

rule.message: File does not exist or is not accessible to SMRTPipe

param.name: ignorePolyA
param.label: Full-length reads do not require polyA tails
param.title: Specify whether or not full-length reads require PolyA tails.

param.name: flnctobam
param.label: Convert sam files of full-length non-chimeric reads of insert to bam.
param.title: Convert sam files of full-length non-chimeric reads of insert to bam

param.name: flnctocmph5
param.label: Convert sam files of full-length non-chimeric reads of insert to cmph5.
param.title: Convert sam files of full-length non-chimeric reads of insert to cmph5

param.name: gmap_n
param.label: Maximum number of paths per isoform or read (GMAP --npaths option)
param.title: The maximum number of GMAP paths to show for each isoform or read (the same as GMAP --npaths option). If set to 0, print two paths if chimera detected, else one.

rule.message: Value must be a non-negative integer

module.label: IsoSeq Cluster v1
module.description: A cDNA analysis workflow to predict de novo consensus isoforms of transcripts from the classified reads using the ICE (Iteratively Clustering and Error Correction) algorithm. Align predicted consensus isoforms to the user-specific reference sequence using GMAP.

param.name: cluster
param.label: Predict consensus isoforms using the ICE algorithm
param.title: Specify whether or not to predict consensus isoforms using the Iterative Clustering and Error Correction (ICE) algorithm.

param.name: maxIterations
param.label: Maximum number of iterations.
param.title: The maximum number of iterations called in the ICE algorithm.

rule.message: Value must be a positive integer between 0 - 1000

param.name: nChunks
param.label: Number of chunks
param.title: The number of pieces to split isoform clusters while running Cluster.

rule.message: Value mus be a non-negative integer

param.name: cDNASize
param.label: Estimated cDNA size
param.title: Estimated cDNA size, if specified

param.name: quiver
param.label: Call Quiver to polish consensus isoforms
param.title: Specify whether or not to call Quiver to polish consensus isoforms using non-full-length, non-chimeric reads.

param.name: hq_quiver_min_accuracy
param.label: Minimum quiver accuracy to classify an isoform as HQ
param.title: The minimum Quiver accuracy needed to classify an isoform as high quality.

param.name: useSGE
param.label: Enable IsoSeq ICE to qsub jobs (SGE is required).
param.title: Enable IsoSeq ICE to qsub jobs. This is an experimental option for speeding up IsoSeq ICE. SGE has to be installed and work.

param.name: maxSGEJobs
param.label: Maximum number of SGE jobs that IsoSeq ICE can submit simultaneously.
param.title: Maximum number of SGE jobs that IsoSeq ICE can submit simultaneously if useSGE is checked.

rule.message: Value must be a non-negative integer
